title: Build doesn't warn/fail when AppXPackageFileList LayoutFile items are missing
body: Was scratching my head wondering what was going on until I enabled verbose msbuild output. Seems if a specified LayoutFile (in AppXPackageFileList) is missing, a file copy is skipped and no other output occurs. It seems this should, at the very least, raise a warning.

comments.body: Hi Rafael. Can you verify that this happens if you create a new project with the latest version? If you open the project created with the previous version you will get the same issue.
This is still a problem in latest extension.
Thank you for your feedback. This is a known bug and we are working on a fix.
